snippet: Kevin McGeever, who made a fortune selling luxury homes in Dubai, disappeared from his mansion in County Galway last May and said he was kidnapped and tortured.
abstract: Irish police are still confounded by case of Kevin McGeever, Irish tycoon who says he was abducted in May 2012 and tortured during captivity.
lead_paragraph: Kevin McGeever, who made a fortune selling luxury homes in Dubai, disappeared from his mansion in County Galway last May and said he was kidnapped and tortured.

headline.seo: Irish Property Tycoon Found, but Details Are Still Elusive
headline.main: Irish Tycoon Found, Hazy on Abduction
headline.print_headline: Irish Tycoon Found, Hazy On Abduction
